profile.CN:
宛如亲手解开绳结一般，
自触碰之处开始崩坏。
profile.NA: Like a knot coming undone, it begins to unravel from the point of contact.

profile.CN:
聆听兽的嘶吼之后，
你将紧握胜利。
profile.NA: Upon hearing the beast's roar, victory shall be in your grasp.

profile.CN:
自地底响彻的同胞之音。
成为呼唤亡者的乐章。
profile.NA: The sound of one's fellows, beating down in the bowels of the earth. This tune calls forth the dead.

profile.CN:
紧握这诱惑强烈的手。
漫漫前路深藏于黑暗之中。
profile.NA: Temptation takes one by the hand. Darkness is its ultimate destination.

profile.CN:
天之光遍临于我。
宛如被祝福的华彩所包裹。
profile.NA: O light of the heavens, rain down upon me as I am anointed with your blessing.

profile.CN:
向慈爱的雨献上感谢。
为水之治愈感到满足。
profile.NA: Give thanks to the gentle rain. Be grateful for the water's soothing touch.

profile.CN:
硕果累累的恩惠。
如其所愿的耀眼。
profile.NA: A bountiful harvest leads to blessings. Dazzling, glittering...as you wish.

profile.CN:
干净利落的起手。
定然粉碎的目标。
profile.NA: To begin, stand resolute. Take aim and bring it down.

profile.CN:
积聚靠近愈发密集。
如其所想耀眼闪亮。
profile.NA: Come, gather around. Brilliance is at your fingertips.

profile.CN:
解放桎梏。
安康同行。
profile.NA: The shackles have fallen away, along with all peace of mind.

profile.CN:
「芙！　芙芙芙呜！！」
（为你喜欢的指令卡配上我哦！）
profile.NA: "Fou! Foufoufooou!!!" (Translation: Put me on a Command Card of your choice!)

profile.CN:
人理续存保障机构　迦勒底。
为人类的前途带来安心。
但愿我们到达的地点不会有什么错误。
profile.NA: Chaldea, the Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity. We safeguard the future of mankind. Our wish is for the path we take to be the right one.

profile.CN:
此乃冠以胜利之名的剑。
据说周身缠绕的光芒包含了人们的感情。
profile.NA: Its name means the sword that grants victory. It's said that the light it emits contains the people's wishes.

profile.CN:
「这是新的从者支援术式，
　『指令纹章』……好厉害啊，前辈！
　说是只要贴在指令卡上，
　就能发挥各式各样的效果！」
profile.NA: "So this is the new Servant support spell...a Command Code. It's wonderful, Senpai! Putting it on a Command Card will enable a variety of effects!"

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
纹样酷似注入了魔力的宝石。
profile.NA:
The magical seal mark of a certain Master. 

It has the image of a gem that is filled with magical energy.

profile.CN:
传说曾经捕获了天之公牛的锁链。
据说对象的神性越高，硬度就越强。
profile.NA: A chain that was said to have once bound the Bull of Heaven. They say the greater the target's Divinity, the more constrictive the chain becomes.

profile.CN:
「刻印乃是展示力量方式之物。
　以本王为纹样是理所当然的选择。
　充分发挥这份力量吧……！」
profile.NA:
"Engravings are a symbol of power. It is only sensible to choose me as a symbol.
Make use of this power as you like!"

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
形状酷似小器物。
profile.NA:
A certain Master's Command Seal.

It bears the image of a small chalice.

profile.CN:
蕴藏着神代魔力的黄昏大剑。
据说根据持有者的不同，可成为圣剑也可成为魔剑。
profile.NA:
A longsword of twilight infused with magical energy from the Age of Gods.

It can turn into a sacred sword or a demonic sword depending on its wielder.

profile.CN:
「御主，我的背后就托付给您了。
　相反，当您前行道路被阻塞的时候，
　我会用这把剑为您开辟道路。」
profile.NA: "Master, I will entrust my back to you. In return, should you ever come against an obstacle, I will open the path for you with this blade."

profile.CN:
「被记载于神话中的传说猎人，
　经历了诸多风流韵事的好男人——
　那就是我。俄里翁·The·超人。
　除了会不小心射中女神芳心以外，
　总体是个完美的爱之猎人……呵呵。
　来吧，尽情把我贴在可爱女孩子从者的身上吧！！

　啊，这个先不谈这个了，
　随便调查人家名字的意义可不好哦？」
profile.NA:
"The legendary hunter of myth, and just an overall good-looking guy who's a big hit with the ladies.


Yep, that's me. Orion the superman.

Other than the fact that I accidentally pierced the heart of a goddess, I'm the perfect love hunter...heh heh.


So don't hesitate to pair me with any of the cute Servant girls!


Oh, but that aside, don't waste your time looking up the meaning of my name, okay?"

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
模仿了寄宿于其身的体术源流。
profile.NA: A certain Master's magical seal. It bears an image of the martial arts power that dwells within the Master's body.

profile.CN:
在构筑了近代炼金术基础的人物之轶事中登场的剑。
常被用作成人仪式中师长或双亲赠送的纪念品。
profile.NA:
The sword mentioned in the story of the one who established the foundation of modern alchemy.

Parents and masters often offer it as a celebration of reaching adulthood.

profile.CN:
「就算是圣诞节，我也不会妥协或宽容。
　好孩子的条件有三点。

　其一，要彬彬有礼地迎接圣诞老人。
　其二，要面带笑容地慰劳圣诞老人。
　其三，要充满感谢地欢送圣诞老人。

　另外最后还有一点。
　那就是心怀希望地，等待明年的圣诞节。

　只有能遵守这些条件的人，
　才有机会迎来降落的我与驯鹿。
　尽管礼物是随机的，但不准抱怨。」
profile.NA:
I will neither compromise nor make exceptions regarding the three rules for what makes a good children. Not even at Christmas.


First, they must remain dignified when meeting Santa.

Second, they must reward Santa with their smiles.

Third, they must send Santa off with gratitude.


And one final thing: they must await next Christmas with hope.


Reindeer and I shall only visit those who can follow those rules. Our gifts may be random, but we will tolerate no complaints.

profile.CN:
以某位王的不敬为契机被释放出来的强大魔兽。
其外形简直就是月之女神神罚的体现。
profile.NA:
A giant demonic beast let loose into the wild thanks to the disrespect shown by a certain king.

Its appearance is the embodiment of divine punishment from the moon goddess.

profile.CN:
原本拥有足以能让死者从黄泉返回的力量，
是冥界神宝中的神宝。
但是，在现在持有者的手中，
能发挥的性能仅被限定为其中一部分。
profile.NA:
A truly divine treasure among treasures of the underworld, powerful enough to revive the dead.

Due to its owner, its performance is limited to only a fraction of its full potential.

profile.CN:
「今天一天辛苦啦～☆
　打算先吃饭？　先洗澡？
　还是说……打·活·动♡
　作为您可靠的巫女狐，
　我一定会助您一臂之力的，御主。」
profile.NA:
"You've done a terrific job today☆ 

Would you like a meal first? Or would you like a bath first?

Or perhaps you would like an e-v-e-n-t♡ 

As your reliable fox shrine maiden, I will support you however I can, Master!"

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
纹样象征着春天的花。
profile.NA:
The magical seal mark of a certain Master.

It bears the image of a flower that represents spring.

profile.CN:
居住在浮游于空中的庭院中的黑衣鸽子。
身负在恋爱的季节将人们生活小插曲传播出去的职责，
明明是只使魔，却会向他人暴露自己主人的秘密。咕噜波。
profile.NA:
A dark-coated dove that lives in the floating garden. They work as messengers reporting about various occurrences during the season of love.

Though they are familiars, they sometimes reveal the secrets of their own master. Coo-coo-poh.

profile.CN:
传说连五星评价的☆都能斩断的暗黑之剑。
尽管真伪不明，但在Alter元素的指引下，交由黑暗圆桌最终兵器的剑能够发挥巨大的威力。

顺便一提，尽管这把剑可以通过网购获得，但由于其深受谜之文学美少女爱用的传言传开，因此商品的价格水涨船高。
profile.NA:
The sword of darkness said to slice through even five-star rated ☆s. Whether this is true or not is unclear, but through the guidance of Alternium, the sword became the ultimate final weapon for the Dark R.O.U.N.D.S. that possesses incredible power.


Also, it can be purchased online, but rumors of this sword being a favorite of a cute, mysterious literature aficionado knight circulated, causing the sword to sell for a premium.

profile.CN:
「倘若要娶余这把极致之剑，
　剑鞘也必须是极致的才行。
　只不过光论极致这个词，其实也存在千差万别，
　大家都有各自“擅长”的方面。
　余之御主啊，
　不用害怕，说出自己的梦想吧。
　余乃是为了实现那个梦想而挥舞的剑。
　呵，余之爱比龙之吐息更为炙热。
　做好觉悟吧——将其纳入手中！」
profile.NA: "If you are to take a supreme sword like myself as your bride, then the sheath must also be superb as well. Though, some may differ in interpreting what 'superb' means here, since there are a great many things one might be proud of! Master, do not hold back. Tell me your dreams. I exist to be wielded to grant those dreams. Heh. My love is more fiery than a dragon's breath. Prepare yourself...and make use of me!"

profile.CN:
无论是强者，还是弱者，
无论是幸运之人，还是不幸之人，
待遇一律平等。

这种小恶魔制作的轮盘——

或许是那位尽管十分可爱（Cute），
却总给人添麻烦（Cursed）少女的
——笨拙的（Clumsy）爱情表现吧。
profile.NA:
Whether one is powerful or weak...

Lucky or unlucky...

Everyone is treated equally.


The slot machine the little devil made...


...may just be the Cute but Curse-happy girl's Clumsy way of expressing her love.

Just maybe...

profile.CN:
一个侦探，与一个黑幕的因缘。
以吞没他们的瀑布为名的棺材。
profile.NA: A coffin bearing the name of a waterfall...the conflict between a detective and a mastermind.

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
纹样参考了由于被诸多意图捉弄而懊恼不已的男人的情感。
profile.NA:
The command seal of a certain Master.

It bears the image of a man's emotional torment by others' scheming.

profile.CN:
三叉尖端分别寄宿着创造与破坏之神力量的枪。
由于现在被其妻子借来使用，
因此不具备原来持有者能够发挥的力量。

话虽如此，仍然改变不了为女神所用的宝具这一事实，所以其阶级被定位为EX。
profile.NA: A spear with each tip imbued with the power of the God of Creation and Destruction. As the wife of the spear's original owner currently possesses it, the weapon is not as powerful as it would be were the original owner wielding it. Even so, it's still a Noble Phantasm wielded by a goddess, and so is designated as EX rank.

profile.CN:
「请毫无保留地道出您的痛苦与喜悦吧。

　没有这双手无法包容的众生，
　没有这双手无法掬取的恸哭，
　同时，所有欲望不分贵贱——

　来吧，请将内心尽情地向我——」

　大悟与解脱在其指尖中随喜自在。
　抵达之地乃是杀生院，如颚般天上乐土。
profile.NA:
"Tell me all your suffering, your joy...tell me everything in detail.


There are no creatures that these hands cannot embrace,

No lament that these hands cannot lift up,

And all types of desires are equally honored...


Now come, pour your heart out to me..."


Enlightenment and Nirvana are hers to command.

Your final destination is the paradise that is Sessyoin.

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
纹样参考了他侍奉的伟大帝王的外套。
profile.NA: A certain master's command seal. It bears the image of a great king's cloak, whom the Master once served.

profile.CN:
可以随着目的变化成多种形态的
非常稀有的会说话礼装。

由于其说话尖锐不留情，
经常遭受主人的责罚，
但即便如此，对于灰色少女来说，它也是自小就陪伴身旁的

——无可取代的朋友般的存在。
profile.NA:
An extremely rare talking Mystic Code capable of transforming into various shapes as needed.


It is exceptionally rude, and so is often chastised by its owner.


Even so, it has remained by the ashen-colored girl's side since her childhood...


He is an irreplaceable friend to her.

profile.CN:
「人们说我是万能的。
　但其实这并没有什么特别的。
　一切都来源于永无止境的学习。
　换言之，你也是怀有这种可能性、
　能让这种才能开花结果的存在。
　天才不过是一种结果。
　是基于周围的定义得到的称号。

　但是呀，正因为如此，
　我也有了觉悟，立志要做配得上这种定义的人物，
　挺起胸膛高声大喊！

　——“Uomo Universale（万能之人）”！」
profile.NA:
People call me universal, but that's nothing special. Everything I did resulted from my ceaseless studies. That means you have the capacity to make your own potential blossom as well. Being a genius is just what results from that. It's a title that can only be given by those around us.


That's exactly why I think you'll become worthy of it someday. And so I can shout this to the heavens with utmost confidence:


"Uomo Universale!"

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
纹样参考了应人们愿望而生的少女所穿的制服。
profile.NA:
The command seal of a certain Master.

It bears the image of a school uniform worn by a girl born from the wishes of the people.

profile.CN:
刀刃乱纹犹如排列着八重樱的花瓣，刀身犹如蕴含着晶莹露水的美丽古刀。

刀上刻有表示了刀工流派的『—』之铭文，雕着象征着不老长寿的菊花纹——

然而讽刺的是，将此作为爱刀的剑士却年纪轻轻因病落下了帷幕。
profile.NA:
An ancient sword adorned with double-flowered cherry blossom petals. Its blade is said to be beautiful, as if glistening with dew.


The word "ichi" is inscribed upon the blade to indicate the swordsmith's sect, and the crest of a chrysanthemum, said to represent perennial youth and longevity, is also etched into the steel.


Ironically, the swordsman who used and cherished this blade died of a dreadful illness at a young age.

profile.CN:
「人生五十年　与下天住人相比　如梦似幻

　总之，我认为世间岂会有不灭之物，
　自己也消失在了红莲之火中，
　但不知出于什么因果，或是罪业，
　结果还是和这种事扯上了关系。
　
　没什么，既然时代需要我，那自然无可奈何。
　来吧，三界神佛回归灰烬。

　——我就是第六天魔王波旬，织田信长！」
profile.NA:
"A human life spans but fifty years; set against life in the heavens, it is but a dream...an illusion.


There you have it. This encompasses everything that is destined to perish, and even though I perished within the roaring flame, some twist of fate, or maybe even karma, has led to me getting drawn into an event like this.


Don't fret. I can't help it if the times cry out for me. Time to destroy all three realms of existence.


For I am Oda Nobunaga, the Demon King of the Sixth Heaven!"

profile.CN:
拥有不屈之精神、不放弃之心，以及不灰心之灵魂的
某个名门魔术师一族的纹章。

尽管这个家系身为魔术师的发展已经出现了衰落的迹象，
但他们培养的“除此以外的牵绊”
或许终有一天能让石之鸟化为火焰。
profile.NA:
The crest of a certain prestigious magecraft family who carry themselves with an unyielding resolve, a heart that never surrenders, and a spirit that is never discouraged.


While a shadow has been cast over the family's growth, the bonds it has formed may one day allow the stone bird to rise like a phoenix.

profile.CN:
可爱而又极其可疑的章鱼。
然而其真面目，
则是足以影响全世界艺术家的伟大浮世绘画师。

之所以变成这种模样，
是因为过度追求成为『真正的画工』，
从而不小心受到了自己面对的宇宙对面的影响，
还是因为……

不管怎么说，只要能接近真实，
这些对他来说或许都不过是微不足道的小事吧。
profile.NA:
An endearing yet frightful and mysterious octopus.

In truth, it is the great ukiyo-e painter who influenced many artists around the world.


The reason he turned out like that was due to some power from beyond space he encountered in his pursuit to become the "true artist." Or perhaps it was something else...


Either way, if it means that he could reach the truth, changing into this form is probably a mere triviality.

profile.CN:
稀世画工的大笔。
巨大到有一人身高那么长，
一旦挥舞起来，便有千形万象，不择题材。

然而凭半吊子的技术、正常的神志使用的话，
连妄图随波漂流至神域都不能指望。
那还不如干脆——

必须对画执着到疯狂的境地才行。
profile.NA:
The extraordinary artist's giant brush.

It's as long as a person is tall, but no theme or subject material is too extreme once the brush is taken up.


Yet if the brush is wielded by someone who is not as talented, or if they are of sound mind, the resulting work will hardly graze the realm of the gods.

Should that be the case...


The only choice would be to obsess over painting like a madman.

profile.CN:
「哎呀，需要我的帮助吗？　没问题没问题。
　不管怎么样，只要有求于我，我自会帮忙。
　虽说如果不靠自己打倒敌人就无法解决麻烦事，
　但只要为了亲爱的朋友，我定会全力以赴。
　问我为什么？
　因为这样一来人们的生活就会变得滋润，
　也关系到我的各种利益嘛。

　你想呀。人生就是这样吧？」
profile.NA:
"Oh, you need my help? Very well, very well.

I'll be sure to help if such a request is made.

I may not be able to defeat enemies or solve tricky problems on my own, but I will not hold back if it's for the sake of my loving friends.
Why?

Because it quenches the thirst in life, and it would benefit me in so many ways.


Isn't that what life's all about?"

profile.CN:
某位金星女神的丈夫，司掌丰收的牧羊之主。

口气彬彬有礼，外形可爱，但必须提防他的言行才行。
尽管他的言辞充满了亲爱，态度无比真诚，可精神仍站在神的视角上，因此有些部分用人类的常识是无法理解的。
profile.NA:
The shepherd god of the harvest and spouse of a certain goddess of Venus.


He speaks gently. He's painfully adorable. But...take all that with a big grain of salt. Sure, he may speak lovingly and appear serious, but he's still a god, so at times his behavior will be utterly incomprehensible to humans.

profile.CN:
英雄王持有众多财宝中最为奥秘的存在。

刀身部分的三块石板分别代表了天、地与冥界，也可以说表现了宇宙，其能力不仅能影响对峙者全身，甚至会波及整个世界。

是人类这一种族可获得的最强最古老的宝具。
profile.NA:
The most mystifying treasure among the countless relics from the King of Heroes' collection.


The three stone tablets on the blade each symbolize heaven, earth, and the underworld... As such, it is said to represent the universe and so affects not only the bodies of those it faces, but the entire world itself.


It's the strongest and oldest Noble Phantasm man has ever laid its hands on.

profile.CN:
「我是一件武器，是兵器。
　所以希望你能尽情使用我。
　完全不用顾虑我的心情。
　因为打从违背了制作我的神之命令的那刻起，
　我就决定要与人类同在了。」
profile.NA:
"I am a weapon, an armament.

So use me as you will.

You need not worry or hold back.

After all, I resolved to live among humans the moment I turned my back on the gods who created me."

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
属于边境魔术师一族家主。
历史短暂，才华却受到了贵族们的认可，
然而如今没落已久。
profile.NA:
The command seal of a certain Master.

It belongs to the head of a family of mages from a remote land.

The family's talents were acknowledged by the nobles despite its shallow history, but it's as good as bankrupt now.

profile.CN:
被视作宇宙尽头阶级标示的双头圣枪。
曾沉睡于秘密组织·银河警察的中枢，
但机缘巧合地被一位少女获得，
乃是宇宙最古老的人工制品。

那传说中甚至能斩断银河星云的光芒，
据说会不分善恶，铲除所有一切。
profile.NA:
The double-headed sacred spear said to represent the farthest parts of the universe.

It's the oldest artifact in the galaxy, once concealed within the center of a secret society, the Galactic Police, it has now coincidentally fallen into the hands of a young woman.


Its radiant light is powerful enough to destroy even the galactic nebula, said to annihilate all, be it good or evil.

profile.CN:
「怎么，比起丰收，更想要胜利？
　这种事包在我身上吧，
　我会全力击穿你的敌人！」
profile.NA:
"What? You wish for victory more than a good harvest?

Leave it to me, then!

I'll give it my all to shoot down all your enemies!"

profile.CN:
用来治愈伤病员的床。
也是白衣天使发挥其存在意义的地方。
只不过，床并不一定只有让患者睡觉这一个用处。

某位护士长主张，在某些情况下，还可以用来驱除造成患者的病灶。
profile.NA:
A bed for the healing of the sick and wounded.

It is also a device where nurses demonstrate their true abilities.

However, it's not necessarily something for patients to lie down on.


Depending on the situation, it can be a literal tool to eradicate the source of the disease that creates patients in the first place. At least that's what a certain head nurse insists.

profile.CN:
据说是魔兽狮鹫与马之间生出的幻兽。
然而，由于双亲是捕食者与被捕食者的关系，
因此原本就是某个故事中用作「不可能存在」的比喻来使用的，
只是语言学上，或是哲学象征性质的存在。

是作为骑兵被召唤的英灵阿斯托尔福的爱马，
但原本的主人是同属查理曼十二圣骑士之一的布拉达曼特。
profile.NA:
A Phantasmal Beast born from a union of the Demonic Beast Griffin and a horse. 

However, as it is a product of both predator and prey, it was originally used as a metaphor for something impossible in stories, and it was nothing but a linguistic and philosophical symbol. 
 

While it is Rider Astolfo's favorite steed, its original owner is Bradamante, who is also one of the Twelve Paladins of Charlemagne.

profile.CN:
「我的本质只是为主献身的普通栋雷米女孩。

　但如果您打算不断挺身面对苦难的话，
　打算继续不断前行的话，
　就高揭，并挥舞这杆旗帜吧。

　——在主的名下。」
profile.NA:
"I am but a humble girl from Domremy who has devoted herself to the Lord.


But should you continue to face hardships and walk the straight and honest path, I shall raise my flag before you.


...In the name of the Lord."

profile.CN:
由于不小心惹怒了仙人，被诅咒变成老鼠模样的原半神半兽的神之坐骑。
据说其背负的乃是象征财富的伟大象头之神。
profile.NA:
A former half-god, half-beast mount, who was cursed with the form of a mouse after its careless mistake incurred a sage's wrath.
And on its back, it is said that it carries the great elephant-headed deity said to represent fortune and wealth.

profile.CN:
居住于姬路城内名为城中妖怪的创造物。
由千代纸而生的它们不仅能在战斗中攻防自如，还能在各种情况下作为主人的手足被使役。

由于原本是折纸，因此可以被制作成各式各样的种类。
在夏日版本中还以青蛙士兵型、老鼠士兵型、寄居蟹战车和飞鱼战斗机、鸡飞骑兵等形态登场。
profile.NA:
A creature that makes its home in Himeji Castle. Made of chiyogami, they not only attack and defend during battle, but also act as their master's limbs for a variety of purposes.


Since they're originally origami, they can be folded into various forms. During the summer, they take on other guises such as frog- and mouse-shaped soldiers, hermit crab and flying fish tanks, or chicken cavalry.

profile.CN:
某位谜团众多的女王拥有的黄金香炉。

正如她曾向那位以智慧著称的魔术王提出了三个谜题一样，
据说寄宿于灯内的三胞胎灵鬼（镇尼）也会向敌人提出难题。
profile.NA:
A golden incense burner possessed by a certain mysterious queen.


Just like the three riddles once presented to the famous sage, the King of Mages, the three djinn sprites harbored within the burner are said to throw difficult problems at their enemies.

profile.CN:
「无论是如鲜花般绽放的情感，还是飘落凋零的情感，
　这些邂逅全都是心爱的你的故事。

　而陪伴左右，将这些书写下来，
　就是我的存在方式。
　但愿这些词句鲜亮精彩……」
profile.NA:
"The blooming flowers and the way they fall and scatter are all lovely to me, just like your story.


And I nestle close to you and make record, I am as I should be.

May my words be lovely throughout time immemorial."

profile.CN:
「休刻翁侦探事务所正式开张啦！！
　哎，侦探已经够多了？　不要说这种无聊的话啦。
这可不是普通的侦探工作哦。而是专门处理休刻翁的
人理最初的侦探事务所哦！　业务包括调查、跟踪、
盯梢、潜入、纠纷仲裁、介入、护卫、应对暴力、
菜谱提案，从体贴的建议到一针见血的劝告，
与休刻翁相关的所有麻烦事都可以解决！
　而且哦，呵呵，呵呵呵，哎嘿嘿嘿，关于今后计划？
其实我正在筹备积极构想出轨相关问题的应对方案哦！
　无论什么样的困难案件，美丽的休刻翁侦探都能
完美地休刻地解决！
　对吧！？　相当不错吧，美狄亚们！？」

「是呢。」
「还是烤薄饼最棒了！」
profile.NA:
"The Kykeon Detective Agency is now open!!!


Huh? You already have a detective? Come on, don't be such a wet blanket. This place doesn't just do any old detective work! It is, in fact, humanity's very first detective agency specializing in kykeon! Activities include investigation, shadowing, stakeouts, infiltration, mediation, intervention, escort, handling disputes, recipe suggestions, giving both heartfelt and astute advice... We can handle it all as long as it involves kykeon!


And then...heh heh heh...as a long-term goal, I'm actively considering handling cases of infidelity! No matter how hard the case, the wise and beautiful kykeon detective can solve anything as fast as you can say 'o-kaykeon!'
What do you think? Don't all you Medeas think that's wonderful!?"


"I suppose."

"Pancakes sure are the best!"

profile.CN:
在泛人类史中被誉为日本最强剑豪，
来自异乡的天元之花所持之刀。

虽然流派名很容易被人误解为是二刀流剑术，
但其本质意味着“通往空之路”的目标。
profile.NA:
A set of blades famed to be wielded by the foreign flower at the apex of heaven, who was widely considered to be the greatest Japanese swordsmaster in Proper Human History.


There is some misconception that the term refers to the two-sword style, but it is essentially something that represents the concept of reaching emptiness to which Musashi aspired.

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
纹样参考了被称为死神的少女所居住的，冠以曾作为亚文化圣地被人们所熟知的土地之名的临海都市的样子。
profile.NA: A certain Master's magical seal. It bears the image of a coastal city that shares its name with the city that was once the mecca of subculture, where the girl known as the Reaper lives.

profile.CN:
刺绣了意味着『船』这词语的布制纹章。

闪耀于星间旅行的少年心中的那个，
是遥远故乡托付给他的，

——梦想与希望的证明。
profile.NA:
A badge embroidered with a word meaning "ship."


It proudly shines on the breast of the young boy who travels across the stars, given to him in the homeland from which he is growing ever more distant...


It is a symbol of hopes and dreams.

profile.CN:
「大家都爱着我。
　我也最喜欢大家了。
　哪怕“尖刺”偶尔会刺痛内心，
　我也会去爱大家。

　因为我是王后嘛。

　愿天空闪耀。
　愿大地富饶
　愿你幸福——法兰西万岁（Vive La France）」
profile.NA:
"Everyone loves me.

And I love them back.

Even if some thorns pain me at times, I will still love them all.


I'm a queen, after all.


May the sky dazzle.

May the land be graced.

May you be full of happiness... Vive la France!"

profile.CN:
代表了隶属于魔术协会三大部门之一的
蓄积与测量之院的纹章。

无需自己成为最强。
只需创造最强之物。

以这句格言作为信条。
profile.NA:
The crest of one of the three major divisions at the Mage's Association, belonging to the Institute of Aggregation and Analysis.


The members go by the creed that One doesn't need to be the strongest...they simply must create something that is the strongest.

profile.CN:
某位御主的令印。
纹样参考了对有限生命之人的羡慕与憎恨之火。
profile.NA: A certain Master's magical seal. It bears the image of the flames of envy and hatred for those whose lives are destined to end.

profile.CN:
某位美貌不仅能提升士兵士气，更能改变战局的武将所佩戴的面具。

英勇无比的武将对国家忠心耿耿鞠躬尽瘁，
最后却遭上天背弃，被下赐了毒酒。
profile.NA: A mask worn by a general who is said to have possessed beauty that could not only boost his troops' morale, but even change the course of a war. He was blessed with valor and served his country loyally, but in his final days, the heavens turned their back on him and gave him poison to drink.

profile.CN:
「发牌员是冷静而完美的存在。
　无论面对什么样的强敌，无论深陷何等苦境，
　都不能慌张，将全部都倾注于指尖——
　我是被这么教导的，
　如何？
　但愿我能成为你胜利的女神。」
profile.NA: "A dealer must always be calm and perfect. No matter how strong the enemy, no matter what predicament they face, they must never panic, and they should put everything upon the end of their fingers. At least that's what I was taught... What do you think? I do hope I can be your goddess of victory."

profile.CN:
在过去的旅途中邂逅的
统治雪花飞舞之国的多情女王的守护兽（随从）。

与某位从者外形相似，
性格也同样激烈，
但在言行举止中又隐约透露着一丝理性。
另外，在劝诫女王时，
似乎会投掷起司鳕鱼或是起司鱼糕之类的。

现在迦勒底也存在着外形相同的人偶，
每晚守护着御主，
但不知这是否就是当时见过的本人（？）。
profile.NA:
A guardian beast (or perhaps an attendant) in service of the lovesick queen of a snow-covered land, whom he met on a journey long ago. He resembles a certain Servant, and his temperament is equally fierce, but his actions and manner of speech are somewhat more level-headed. When he takes it upon himself to admonish the queen, he hurls things like codfish with cheese or cheese kamaboko at her... Anything with cheese, really.


There is currently a similar plushie in Chaldea, and it seems to be guarding Master by night, though it's not clear whether it is the same person(?) they met that one fateful day.

profile.CN:
拥有可穿透阳光不可及之深海的大冲角，
创造出众多冒险故事的架空潜水艇。

其名字取自被誉为活化石的鹦鹉螺，
但原本的意思就是指『水手』或『船舶』。
profile.NA: A fictional submarine that has become the subject of many tales of adventure. Its design incorporates a massive ram that cuts through the deepest reaches of the sea, where no light can reach. It is named for the mollusk which is considered to be a living fossil, but it actually means "sailor" or "marine vessel."

profile.CN:
「只要人生在世，总会遇到困难的阻挡。
　我认为唯有积极向上，
　齐心协力克服困难的精神，
　才配被称为人类的睿智。
　想必与你们一同迎接的全新邂逅与闪耀，
　才会成为对我来说的最大成果吧。
　Buon viaggio——祝旅途愉快！

　综上所述，
　和本体的莱昂纳多·达·芬奇
　想法略～～有一些不同哦？」
profile.NA:
"As long as we're alive, we will always experience adversity. But if we confront it with the belief that we can overcome anything by working together...that is the true definition of human wisdom. The new encounters and experiences you and I share will be my greatest achievement. Buon viaggio...happy travels!


Just kidding. But I do have a different way of thinking than the original Leonardo da Vinci, you know?"

profile.CN:
因圣杯的失控而诞生的
某个英灵潜意识具现化的存在——？

这是通常的看法，实际上会巨大化、机械化，不知是不是出于每年都想尝试新形态的精神，对形态的变化毫无节操。有些时节连声音都会无意中变化。具体的真实形态尚不明。

人不可貌相，实际战斗力很高，行动上也毫不留情。但感觉有那么一点点可爱。
profile.NA:
A certain Heroic Spirit's subconscious that was actualized into existence after the Holy Grail went berserk... At least that's the general understanding, but this thing can grow or turn into a robot and there don't seem to be any rules about when it can do so. This may be because they're really into updating their form every year. There was even one season when their voices changed too. The details are...fuzzy.


Contrary to their appearance, they are actually quite strong in battle, and their behavior in combat can be quite relentless. They're also totally not cute...

profile.CN:
尾张的笨蛋、风云人物使用的多枪身火绳铳。

可通过转动曲柄进行连续射击。
据说四杆枪身可呈漏斗状展开进行范围攻击，
也可用刺刀应对近身攻击，
具备多重用途。
profile.NA: The multi-barreled matchlock gun that belonged to the Fool of Owari, the mercenary who rode the wave of the times. The gun fires continuously by turning the crank. Its four rotating barrels make it an exceptional ranged weapon, and the bayonet attached to its end makes it effective in melee combat as well. It is truly a versatile weapon.

profile.CN:
「本应只显现一次后就会消失的我
　竟然被委以如此重要的职责……
　就像吃竹轮麸时一样，非常高兴。
　高兴。

　既然如此，我不惜拼上此身、这灵基的一切，
　也要报答您的这份恩情，御主。」
profile.NA:
"I was supposed to disappear after that single manifestation, but now I have such a huge role... The joy that brings me is almost like the first time I ate chikuwabu. So good.


Now then, I shall demonstrate my gratitude using my entire being and Spirit Origin, Master."

profile.CN:
企。

并非可爱的水族馆偶像，
而是某位冰上首席女舞者所说的海中魔兽。
其名字包含了「扭曲」「旋涡」等意思，
据说掌管七大罪中的嫉妒。

鹅。
profile.NA:
Pen.


The loveable bird so often seen at aquariums...is really not what this is. Nope. It's a magical beast of the sea, according to a certain prima donna on ice. Its name means "twisted" or "swirl," and it governs envy, one of the seven deadly sins.


Guin.

profile.CN:
由圣仙之骨制造的法器。
两端没有分叉的尖锐独钴杵
表现了万有本体的真如，
同时也包含了勇猛与破碎等的含义。
profile.NA: A ritualistic tool made by the bones of enlightened sages. The ends of the Vajra do not diverge from its representation of the true nature of all things, and it means bravery or crushing destruction.

profile.CN:
「呀嗬～！　我是玉玉～☆
　比任何人都接近地辅佐、支持您的选择。
　我的目标就是成为这样普通的从者～！
　哎嘿嘿～。
　好嘞！　全力以赴地演奏吧！！」
profile.NA:
Yoo-hoo! It's Yu Yu☆ I stand at your side, closer than anyone else, and I cheer and support you in all your choices. That's the kind of ordinary Servant I strive to be! 
 

Ehehehe. Okay! I'm going to give it my all and make some music!

profile.CN:
传说曾栖息于某条河川边，
拥有甲壳与六条腿的怪物。
虽化身口吐烈火吞噬人类的暴虐俘虏，
但据说这一切皆是为了寻求母爱。

但最终被某位圣女的爱说服了。爱，是很重要的。
profile.NA:
A six-legged, shelled monster said to have lived by a lake. It was made to perform barbarous acts like spewing fire and devouring humans, but it's said that was all because it longed for its mother's love. It was the love of a certain holy maiden that tamed it, though.


Love is clearly quite important.

profile.CN:
由「他」赐予温柔、美丽，闪耀着光辉之淑女的圣杖。

通过高举这把圣杖展现的神圣威光，
可以镇压所有邪恶，令其俯首称臣。
绝不是什么物理的方式。绝对不是。
profile.NA:
A sacred staff given by "him" to a kind, beautiful, and radiant lady.


Holding the staff up to demonstrate its sacred aura can pacify any evil. This is, in no way, a physical subjugation. Nope. Not at all...

profile.CN:
「伴随左右全力相助。
　作为从者实属荣幸。

　请交给我吧，御主。
　我定将全力以赴，
　完成这光荣的任务！　出发！」
profile.NA: "To stand by your side and render assistance... That is truly the highest honor a Servant can ever offer. Please leave everything to me, Master. I shall give everything I have to fulfilling this noble task!"

profile.CN:
始终陪伴在慈悲为怀的神妃左右并守护她的白垩神兽。
原本是猎犬，但幻化成酷似主神化身的样子。
profile.NA:
The white divine beast that stays close and protects the benevolent divine consort.
It was originally a hunting dog, but it has taken the form of the avatar of the King of Gods.

profile.CN:
酷似某位从者……不对，
就是身高矮小了的源氏年轻武士。

但即便身处这种状态，
依然轻巧如在五条大桥上飞舞的燕子，
为取下敌方首级而迈进的态度依然未变。
profile.NA:
A miniature resembling a certain Servant... Actually, it's pretty much a shrunken version of the young Genji warrior.


Even in such a state, the valiant sight of her swiftly flying like a swallow over the Gojo Bridge and taking her enemies' heads remains unchanged.

profile.CN:
牛若丸（暗匿者）持有的羽团扇。

不仅能刮起暴风，
更能引发超越人类智慧的各种神通力。
生前玩的是师傅的大羽扇，
作为宝具时成了自己的东西。
profile.NA:
The feathered fan that Ushiwakamaru (Assassin) carries.


It is said that it summons various divine powers far beyond human ability, such as violent windstorms. While she played with her mentor's great feathered fan during her lifetime, this has become entirely her own after sublimating into her Noble Phantasm.

profile.CN:
「玩耍就是修行，修行就是玩耍！
　如疾风般穿越山间的树木，
　飞跃河川，巡游原野。
　全都是游戏，全都是修行！
　这就是天衣无缝的极致！

　来吧，今天让我们尽情玩个痛快吧，主公！」
profile.NA:
"To play is to train, and to train is to play! Running through mountain forests like a swift wind, jumping over rivers, and zipping across fields... everything is a game, and everything is training! The logic is flawless!


Now, let's have another day of playing, Master!"

profile.CN:
某位成为了御主的从者的令印。
纹样参考了遭遇数次背叛的神代魔术师挥舞的杖子。
profile.NA: The command seal of a certain Servant-turned-Master. It bears the image of a staff of a mage from the Age of Gods who caused and experienced much betrayal.

profile.CN:
冠以某位祭司之名的圣遗物。
这位圣人现在成了东西方鼓励人们追逐爱情、寻求恋情，为人们带去甜美一刻的“那一天”的象征。

另外，这绝不是什么用来束缚男性的布。
profile.NA:
A relic bearing the name of a certain priest. This saint's name has become the symbolic representation of a particular day of the year, when love is encouraged, celebrated, and offers people sweet memories in the East and West alike.


It should be noted that this shroud is not, in any way, used to restrain men.

profile.CN:
「嗨，御主！
　
　能得到我的祝福，
　可是非常，非常幸运的哦！

　虽然爱与恋都给了亲爱的，
　但如果是您，我可是非常愿意给与祝福哦！
　您可别说不要哦？」

（无论是爱还是恋，
　就不能都再减少一点吗……）

「——亲爱的，你刚才有说什么吗？」

「不，我什么都没说！！」
profile.NA:
"Hello Master!


You should consider yourself to be astonishingly lucky to receive a blessing from me! My love belongs to my Darling, but I'll shower you with plenty of blessings. You're not going to refuse,  right?"


(Could you maybe tone the love down a bit?)


"Did you say something, Darling?"


"Nope! You heard nothing!"

profile.CN:
渴望救济众生的青年，为救出某件东西而扮装时使用的怪盗服装中的帽子。

据说不单纯是扮装道具，而是实际具备正常灵衣的功能。

「因为规矩是很重要的嘛。」
profile.NA:
The hat of the phantom thief costume that a young man who wished for people’s salvation, in order to free a certain thing, has dressed up as.


It is said that it is not a simple roleplay set, but functions as a full Spiritual Costume.


“Promises are important, after all.”

profile.CN:
自称·偶像的从者身穿演唱会用服装时佩戴的帽子。

由于她的音乐品味过于激进，
所以对人们来说是魔曲、是拷问、相当于毒药。
但是，当她“为别人歌唱”时，
她的歌声可谓歌姬（Diva）。
profile.NA:
The hat that the self-proclaimed Idol Servant puts on her head when she dons her concert outfit.


Her sense of music is so overly radical that to people, it’s no different to an evil song, torture, and as toxic as the puffer fish poison.


However, it is said that when she “sings for other people’s sake”, her singing voice becomes that of a songstress (diva).

profile.CN:
被某位宫廷魔术师称作，
「星之泪」
或是评价为
「由于非此星之物，故旅人之星亦无从知晓的，
　希望碎片」的，
据说在遥远的过去坠落到地上的灵石。

蔷薇皇帝使用这个亲手打造而成的
极品华贵之物。
虽然不是宝具，但会与主人高涨的感情相呼应，身缠火焰，
是一把会察言观色的宝剑。
profile.NA:
According to a certain Royal Mage, it’s a miraculous stone that fell down to earth in the far bygone days, which was said to be “the tears of the stars”, or “a fragment of hope unknown to even the travelers’ star, something that previously didn’t exist on this planet”.


A top-class premium object built by the Emperor of Roses herself, who uses it.


While not a Noble Phantasm, it is a treasured sword that can read between the lines and clad itself in flame in response to its owner’s proud emotions.

profile.CN:
「听说除了我以外还有其他Saber！
　飒爽地乘坐爱机东·斯塔利恩Ⅱ来——
　不，这次并没有故障哦？　没错。

　话说哪儿有Saber，Saber在哪儿啊。
　我要将那些个红色白色黑色统统消灭！

"How do you do, Master?


Uhmm……

For your sake, someone who holds my hands always.

I shall endeavor to do my best to support you.

Ei, ei, oh!"

某位英灵潜在意识实体化的存在——

profile.NA:
Some kind of―――Roshigumi Corps Version of something born from the Holy Grail going crazy, the realization of a certain Heroic Spirit's consciousness.

A lone man, dreaming of a new era, ran through the Bakumatsu age with his ancestral sword and his friend's gun in hand.

迦勒底谨制的金戒指。

迦勒底谨制的银戒指。

A silver ring made with care in Chaldea.

蓝雪落下又沉积于地的某个冬日，

profile.NA:
A giant blue ox rescued by a lumberjack girl on a winter day, one where pale snow piled up in thick piles.

她追求着人之娱乐。
她追踪着人之秘密。

That's why I fight and wield the sword.

A pure white dog who accompanied the Aurora King in the city that never sleeps.

炎之画家的大画笔。

仿佛追逐着太阳一样地，

The large brush of the blazing painter.

Is there anything you would like from your mother?


If you are tired, I can be your lap pillow.

Please relax and take it easy.

And if you would like a sword, I shall swing it with all my heart.

Whether it is an oni or a demon, I shall immediately cut them down.


Fufufu.

So, which will it be?

Whichever is fine with mother.

毫无理由的美丽，

A mysterious creature who resembles a certain girl.

"Something" moody, incomprehensible, and invisible to the ordinary human.

According to the Kojiki and Nihon Shoki, it is a sword said to have been found within the body of the gigantically enormous serpent, one that spans over eight valleys and summits.

Hmm.

The legend of the North, the secret of the snow, and the Goddess of Winter.

I shall show you the power of these three Divine Spirit combined.

The answer is a big sister.

I am going to fight kindly, strictly, yet beautifully!

由于圣杯的暴走而诞生的谜之生物———

A version of the mysterious creatures born from the Holy Grail going rampage, but knocked into its sense by tea ceremony?

在古代的日本，某位女王曾在典礼中使用过的铜镜。

有那特别的一件存在。
profile.NA:
A bronze mirror said to have been used by a queen from ancient Japan in rituals.


Sometimes it would be used to impart wisdom, sometimes to predict blessings, and while many were created as if to reflect all things of the universe, it is said that there is only a single special one among them.

profile.CN:
「天上日轮，地上黄金，
　为得此世间所有的一切，
　妾身在此绚烂豪华参上！

　极致燃烧的茶茶的业火，
　满怀感激地承受吧！！」
profile.NA:
"The sun in the heavens! The treasures of the world! In order to take everything from this world, I have come to visit in a gorgeous and luxurious way!


Be grateful that you can bask in the hellfire of the unequaled burning Chacha!"

profile.CN:
追随某个封神执行者的坐骑。

平时是一副看了就会很想睡觉的样子，
但是一旦释放魔力，便披上如同龙一样巨大的魔力，
据说可以直上苍穹，烧尽敌军。

但据执行者说，终究不是龙种。
profile.NA:
The mounted ride who accompanies the executioner of the Investiture of the Gods.


While it normally looks sleepy, it is said that once its power is unleashed, it is cladded in enormous magical energy that rivals a dragon, galloping across the sky, it burns the enemy armies to the ground.


However, according to the executioner, it is absolutely not a dragon species.

profile.CN:
由于某个原因而募集“好汉”的少女，
以此为方针而依偎在她身侧的，青龙形态的棍。

有着非常抓人眼球的外观，
能拉伸变形为各种各样的形态，非常帅气，
也是非常优秀的武器。
用来耕田也行。
profile.NA:
A staff taking the form of the Azure Dragon, one that stays close to the young girl who is seeking “hǎohàn (brave heroes)” due to certain circumstances to guide her.


Not only it has a catchy appearance, but it can also grow and transform into various shapes, looks super cool, and is an outstanding weapon to boost.

It also can be used to tilt the field.

profile.CN:
「呵呵ー！

　今天也朝气蓬勃地诅咒巴黎中心―――
　不可以这样吗？
　那敛取些银币呢？
　也不行吗？　唔。

　什么都行吧，只要好玩就行。
　但是如果不好玩就咒ー杀你哦！」
profile.NA:
"Kukuh!


Another day of cursing the heart of Paris in high spirit―――

We're not doing that?

Then are we collecting silver coins?

Not that either? Hmmm.


Well, as long as it’s fun, we can do whatever~

But if it's not, I'm going to curse you to death!!"

profile.CN:
某个国家的女王的女儿所穿的，时尚的鞋子。

对大多数事情不感兴趣，
有着恶毒爱好的公主殿下，
梦想着用自己的双手打造出最好的一双，
可以纯粹地占有的―――

用与“恶性”相似意思的话说，
那便是叫作高跟鞋（heel）的鞋子。
profile.NA:
The stylish shoes worn by the daughter of the queen of a certain country.


The princess who has no interests in ordinary things and do evil things for a hobby is so genuinely obsessed with them that she dreams of making a finest pair by her own hands.


However, it is said that the word used for those heels is the same as the word used to describe "malignant".

profile.CN:
在某个国家，最高傲最美丽的妖精骑士
所携带的既是剑也是枪的开刃武器。

冠以与另一世界的高洁的骑士所持之剑同一名字的那个，
就她本身的实力而言，不过是一把借来的剑。

然而那不过是―――她自己所期望的『我愿成为』之物
而生的武器。
profile.NA:
A weapon that functions as both a sword and a spear, carried by the most prideful and beautiful faerie knight of a certain country.


While it bears the same name as the sword owned by a noble knight from another world, it is nothing more than a weapon that borrows from her inherent power.


However, it is―――a weapon born from her own wish "to be this way".

profile.CN:
「哎呀，是你在渴望我的裁定吗？
　那好吧。
　你的善之轻与罪之重，
　就由我来上呈星辰裁决吧！」
profile.NA:
"Oh my, you wish to know my verdict?

Very well.

This is the weight of your goodness and this the weight of your sins. I shall give you the judgment of the stars!"

profile.CN:
以『自由奔放的野性』为方针（policy），
某位世界领先的民间军事公司之一的首席执行官，
万能美人秘书（光）戴着的耳状饰品。

顺带一提，
SPY的外表和公司的名字虽然都挺狐狸（fox）的，
但再怎么说，也是兔子（bunny）。
profile.NA:
The ear decoration worn by a certain omnipotent and beautiful secretary (Light), who is also the CEO of a world-leading private military company with a “free and uncontrolled wildness” policy.


By the way, while she is quite a fox in her SPY appearance and company name, ultimately, she is a bunny.

profile.CN:
虽然是凭借拟似灵基中的性爱之神赐名
才得以诞生的使魔，
但为了隐藏其身姿还是要扣上的纸袋。

怎么看都只是一个纸袋面具而已，
但却藉由一种不可思议的神圣的力量
隐蔽着、保护着
穿戴者的真名、社会地位和个人隐私。
简直就是上帝干扰（God Jamming）。

虽然还不清楚其背后的原理，
比起下面的素颜来说，它算得上是相当的“表情丰富”了。

某个狂暴的小丑使用的，怀表型炸弹。
准确来说是咒术的一种，而非物理性的道具，
只要没有对诅咒的耐性，就没办法回避。

虽然那恶魔般的残忍令被施术者蒙上绝望，
但那仅仅只是结果，
一切不过只是让事情变得「愉快」的手段。

———也许是这样子的哦。

「渴求爱的羔羊啊，
　吾在此传达主的旨意。

　代价，是什么？
　那就要看你的信仰是何等程度了。
　太少了也没关系的，
　太多了那就更好了。
　虽然也不用说，
　我的教会是不会抗拒捐款的。
　尽情地慈善捐款，也没关系哦？」
